content: Is the Chernoff bound proved in Mathlib? More specifically, I need the case of independent boolean variables

We have it here (for one random variable, not for a sum): docs#ProbabilityTheory.measure_ge_le_exp_cgf
We have this about the cgf of a sum of independent random variables: docs#ProbabilityTheory.iIndepFun.cgf_sum
You will need to describe the cumulant generating function of your specific random variables yourself though. We don't have any explicit cgf.
I have the i.i.d. case here (though it's not the tightest version): https://github.com/google-deepmind/debate/blob/main/Prob/Chernoff.lean
Command Master has marked this topic as resolved.
